name: databox-twitter-sentiment
description: A simple Databox app that performs sentiment analysis on your Twitter timeline

scripts.release: docker build -t databox-twitter-sentiment . && docker tag databox-twitter-sentiment amar.io:5000/databox-twitter-sentiment && docker push amar.io:5000/databox-twitter-sentiment

author: Yousef Amar <yousef@amar.io> (http://yousefamar.com/)
